dcterms:creator: J. Johnson
B. Hariharan
L. van der Maaten
L. Fei-Fei
C. L. Zitnick
R. Girshick
dcterms:description: A diagnostic dataset for compositional language and elementary visual reasoning, containing ground-truth programs that describe the reasoning required to answer questions about images.
dcterms:title: CLEVR

dcterms:creator: J. Johnson
B. Hariharan
L. van der Maaten
L. Fei-Fei
C. L. Zitnick
R. Girshick
dcterms:description: A dataset of human-posed free-form natural language questions about CLEVR images, designed to evaluate the ability of models to generalize to human language.
dcterms:title: CLEVR-Humans

dcterms:creator: J. Johnson
B. Hariharan
L. van der Maaten
L. Fei-Fei
C. L. Zitnick
R. Girshick
dcterms:description: A dataset for investigating the ability of VQA models to perform compositional generalization, containing data in two different conditions with varying color palettes.
dcterms:title: CLEVR-CoGenT
